title: C/C++ `namespace` incorrect indentation
body:
### Summary

When I define a namespace, the indentation doesn't behave as expected, instead behaving as a top level statement.

VSCode

https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/79347623/224097721-d698f7b4-e592-4d94-a3f8-74146f135721.mov



Helix


https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/79347623/224097794-42410218-ec41-47b0-9d16-82ef7e671f11.mov



### Reproduction Steps

<!-- Ideally provide a key sequence and/or asciinema.org recording. --> 

I tried this:

1. `hx main.cpp`
2. Declare a namespace
3. Any declaration inside the namespace will have incorrect indentation.

I expected this to happen:
Correct indentation.

Instead, this happened:
No indentation.

### Helix log
